message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. It offers exceptional quality and functionality. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you for $200. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I am willing to consider $140 as the price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to offer the product at $125. This is my final offer, as it closely aligns with your proposed price while still allowing me to achieve a reasonable profit.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to offer the product at $115. This is my final offer, as it balances your budgetary concerns while ensuring a reasonable return for myself.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $105. This is my final offer, aiming to find a balance between your budgetary needs and my business objectives.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
